content:
Hello,

I'm wondering how often these packages are reset on the validator (https://inferno.healthit.gov/validator/) I ask because I was trying to test against a CARIN BB 1.0.0 package and I found that it wasn't loaded. I was able to successfully upload the latest package from http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/history.html. I am then able to use the tool to validate resources to conform to CARIN. I had done this same thing last week and found that I had to re-load the package this week.

I think my question is 2 part: 1. How often are these reset? 2. How often are the shipped/included packages updated to the latest versions?

I guess there is a 3rd scenario possible, that someone else uploaded an older version of the same implementation guide that overwrote the latest one I was testing. Not sure if that is possible.

Thanks

Fred
